reference:
In this dataset, math and read scores are taken at the outcome
variables. Among the remaining predictors, income and educ
might be considered as background variables necessary to control for.
Interest might then be focused on whether the behavioural variables
antisoc and hyperact contribute beyond that.
usage: A data frame with 243 observations on the following 6 variables.
description:
Description
The dataset come from a small random sample of the U.S. National
Longitudinal Survey of Youth.
title: National Longitudinal Survey of Youth Data

parameters.hyperact:
score on a measure of child's
hyperactive behavior, 0:5
parameters.educ: years of education of child's father
parameters.antisoc: score on a measure of child's antisocial behavior, 0:6
